conbody.p: Users from any account can be deleted using the Eucalyptus Administrator Console or the command line. To delete a user from the Administrator Console select Users from the QUICK LINKS panel, select the user to delete from the list, and then click the Delete users button.
The euare-userdel command can be used to delete users from the command line. It has the following syntax:euare-userdel –r –u <user_name> <--delegate=account_name>
The -r option recursively removes the users credentials, policies, and login profile, and also removes the user from any groups.
There is also a –p preview option that shows what the command would do, but without actually doing it.
